name: 漫画居
request: http://m.manhuaju.com/statics/search.aspx?key={key}@charset->UTF-8@header->user-agent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/86.0.4240.198 Safari/537.36

search.title: function Main(text){return jsoup(text,'a.txtA');}
search.url: function Main(text){return jsoup(text,'a.ImgA@attr->href')+'@header->user-agent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/86.0.4240.198 Safari/537.36';}

detail.author: function Main(html){return jsoup(html,'div.comic-view.clearfix > div.view-sub.autoHeight > div > dl:nth-child(3) > dd');}
detail.upDate: function Main(html){return jsoup(html,'div.comic-view.clearfix > div.view-sub.autoHeight > div > dl:nth-child(5) > dd');}

chapter.list: function Main(html){return jsoups(html,'div.comic-chapters > div  > ul  > li');}
chapter.name: function Main(text){return jsoup(text,'a');}
chapter.url: function Main(text){var url = jsoup(text,'a@attr->href');url = url.replace('.html','-{p}.html')+'@zero->1@start->1';if((url+'').indexOf('.apk')>0){return null}return url;}

comic.url: function Main(text){var img = jsoup(text,'mip-link > img@attr->src');if((img+'').length < 1){img = jsoup(text,'mip-link > mip-img:not([style])@attr->src');}if((img+'').length < 1){var img2 = jsoups(text,'div.UnderPag > mip-img');if(img2.length>1){return img2;}};if((img+'').length < 1){img = jsoup(text,'div:not([style]) > mip-link > mip-img:not([style],[width])@attr->src');}if(img.indexOf('cover')==-1){return img;}return null};
